skins.shipDescription: Pennsylvania-class battleship ¨C Pennsylvania, Hull Number BB-38!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Pennsylvania, lead ship of an improved Nevada class. You can call me "Sister Penn." I really shouldn't brag, but I've sortied on countless successful missions. You can definitely depend on me!
skins.acquisition: I'm Pennsylvania, lead ship of an improved Nevada class. You can call me "Sister Penn." I've sortied on countless successful missions, so you can be confident in my ability.
skins.login: Commander, you know you can always share any thoughts you have with me.
skins.details: Thanks. This is the first time someone has really cared about me...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Your eyes... Why do they look like those of an abandoned puppy?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Can you please not look at me with those hungry eyes?
skins.secretaryIdle3: You don't have the best imagination, do you?
skins.secretaryTouch: You dont have to get worked up over tiny things, Commander.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ...!! Hold up, are you alright in the head?
